document.full_text: luke rodgers scored in the 33rd minute to cap the teams' six-minute scoring flurry and lift the new york red bulls to a 2-2 draw with the colorado rapids on wednesday night.
document.title: rodgers lifts red bulls to 2-2 tie with rapids
lines_and_colors: luke rodgers scored in the 33rd minute to cap the teams' six-minute scoring flurry and lift the new york red bulls to a 2-2 draw with the colorado rapids on wednesday night.
